scripts.android:release:bungae: bun run build:bungae --platform android --mode release && BUNGAE=true react-native run-android --mode=release
scripts.ios:release:bungae: bun run build:bungae --platform ios --mode release && BUNGAE=true react-native run-ios --mode Release
scripts.bundle:metro:ios: react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
scripts.bundle:metro:android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
